title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\ClusterUpdate
name: ClusterUpdate
description:
ClusterUpdate describes an update to the cluster. Exactly one update can be applied to a cluster with each request, so at most one field can be provided.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.ClusterUpdate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getDesiredNodeVersion
methods.description:
The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade). Use - to upgrade to the latest version supported by the server.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_node_version = 4;

methods.name: setDesiredNodeVersion
methods.description:
The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade). Use - to upgrade to the latest version supported by the server.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_node_version = 4;

params.name: var
params.description: The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade). Use - to upgrade to the latest version supported by the server.

methods.name: getDesiredMonitoringService
methods.description:
The monitoring service the cluster should use to write metrics.

Currently available options:

  • "monitoring.googleapis.com" - the Google Cloud Monitoring service
  • "none" - no metrics will be exported from the cluster

Generated from protobuf field string desired_monitoring_service = 5;

methods.name: setDesiredMonitoringService
methods.description:
The monitoring service the cluster should use to write metrics.

Currently available options:

  • "monitoring.googleapis.com" - the Google Cloud Monitoring service
  • "none" - no metrics will be exported from the cluster

Generated from protobuf field string desired_monitoring_service = 5;

params.name: var
params.description:
The monitoring service the cluster should use to write metrics.

Currently available options:

  • "monitoring.googleapis.com" - the Google Cloud Monitoring service
  • "none" - no metrics will be exported from the cluster

methods.name: getDesiredAddonsConfig
methods.description:
Configurations for the various addons available to run in the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.AddonsConfig desired_addons_config = 6;

methods.name: setDesiredAddonsConfig
methods.description:
Configurations for the various addons available to run in the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.AddonsConfig desired_addons_config = 6;

params.name: var
params.description: Configurations for the various addons available to run in the cluster.

methods.name: getDesiredNodePoolId
methods.description:
The node pool to be upgraded. This field is mandatory if "desired_node_version", "desired_image_family" or "desired_node_pool_autoscaling" is specified and there is more than one node pool on the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_node_pool_id = 7;

methods.name: setDesiredNodePoolId
methods.description:
The node pool to be upgraded. This field is mandatory if "desired_node_version", "desired_image_family" or "desired_node_pool_autoscaling" is specified and there is more than one node pool on the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_node_pool_id = 7;

params.name: var
params.description: The node pool to be upgraded. This field is mandatory if "desired_node_version", "desired_image_family" or "desired_node_pool_autoscaling" is specified and there is more than one node pool on the cluster.

methods.name: getDesiredImageType
methods.description:
The desired image type for the node pool.

NOTE: Set the "desired_node_pool" field as well.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_image_type = 8;

methods.name: setDesiredImageType
methods.description:
The desired image type for the node pool.

NOTE: Set the "desired_node_pool" field as well.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_image_type = 8;

params.name: var
params.description:
The desired image type for the node pool.

NOTE: Set the "desired_node_pool" field as well.

methods.name: getDesiredNodePoolAutoscaling
methods.description:
Autoscaler configuration for the node pool specified in desired_node_pool_id. If there is only one pool in the cluster and desired_node_pool_id is not provided then the change applies to that single node pool.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.NodePoolAutoscaling desired_node_pool_autoscaling = 9;

methods.name: setDesiredNodePoolAutoscaling
methods.description:
Autoscaler configuration for the node pool specified in desired_node_pool_id. If there is only one pool in the cluster and desired_node_pool_id is not provided then the change applies to that single node pool.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.NodePoolAutoscaling desired_node_pool_autoscaling = 9;

params.name: var
params.description: Autoscaler configuration for the node pool specified in desired_node_pool_id. If there is only one pool in the cluster and desired_node_pool_id is not provided then the change applies to that single node pool.

methods.name: getDesiredLocations
methods.description:
The desired list of Google Compute Engine locations in which the cluster's nodes should be located. Changing the locations a cluster is in will result in nodes being either created or removed from the cluster, depending on whether locations are being added or removed.

This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string desired_locations = 10;

methods.name: setDesiredLocations
methods.description:
The desired list of Google Compute Engine locations in which the cluster's nodes should be located. Changing the locations a cluster is in will result in nodes being either created or removed from the cluster, depending on whether locations are being added or removed.

This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string desired_locations = 10;

params.name: var
params.description:
The desired list of Google Compute Engine locations in which the cluster's nodes should be located. Changing the locations a cluster is in will result in nodes being either created or removed from the cluster, depending on whether locations are being added or removed.

This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

methods.name: getDesiredMasterVersion
methods.description:
The Kubernetes version to change the master to. The only valid value is the latest supported version. Use "-" to have the server automatically select the latest version.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_master_version = 100;

methods.name: setDesiredMasterVersion
methods.description:
The Kubernetes version to change the master to. The only valid value is the latest supported version. Use "-" to have the server automatically select the latest version.

Generated from protobuf field string desired_master_version = 100;
